item.title: Belgian pear syrup
item.description: A delicious syrup that can be eaten on bread and used in a multitude of recipes. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 30 min üç≥ Cook time: 6 hours Ingredients 7 pears (Quality doesn’t matter; you can argue that overripe pears are better because they have more sugar content.) 3 apples a small handful of dates, raisins, dried apricots or prunes (optional – you can experiment with these; they can bring out some nice flavors.
